document.description: I somtimes do talk while eating food. But at most times i like to eat my food in peace as it is ... Is It Bad Always Eating In Fast Food Restaurant; Have Your Tried Eating ...
document.body:
Do You Talk While Eating The Food
do you talk while eating the food? why do you talk or don't talk while eating the food? share your opinions here:
[question posted by alpine_007 ]
responses and comments:
I do talk while eating but try not to talk with my mouth full i speak in between bites. The dinner table is the only real place that my hubby and i get a chance to sit and have a conversation. So we are always in conversation at the dinner table while eating. [tina12679] do you think that it's good to talk while eating, i have heard that if you start to argue while talking then you can't digest the food properly, what are your opinions about it? enjoy, happy mylotting. [alpine_007] Yes i do.I dont find any problem talking while eating [sandys] i have seen that some people talk while eating and some of the food comes out of their mouth while talking, what you think? [alpine_007]
I can still be engaged in a light conversation while I'm eating but my meals tend to take longer to finish. So normally I do not talk alot. It is hard to talk with my mouth full. [terry11] yeah you are right, if we talk while eating then the meal takes longer to finish, and then it's temperature also decreases and then it creates problems. [alpine_007] If I eat I talk between bites, I would never talk with my mouth full, because in my opinion it's not only disgusting but very rude. [curvychick77] yes, when you talk while your mouth it really looks bad and also rude. do you think that if you talk while eating it can't be digested properly? thanks, enjoy [alpine_007]
Hi alpine_007! No, I absolutely don't talk while eating food and I can't sopport those who talk while eating; for certain verses I have to concentrate on what I'm eating and I can't concentrate sufficently while talking, moreover I don't like so much seeing semi-digested food in others open mouths. I really like silence, absolute silence while eating! Have a good night! [peppinazzo] i think that is really good that you don't talk while eating the food. enjoy. happy mylotting. [alpine_007] nope,i've got to say that i use my manners.i hate talking with food in my mouth,hehe. [ANGEL114] that is really great that you don't talk while eating. do you think that people look bad while mouth full and talking with others? [alpine_007] We have discussions while having meals, but I never talk while I am chewing. That is just bad manners. Good conversation and love affects your food and the way it nourishes you as wall as how you digest the food. That's what I believe anyway. [keda69] i think that it is good that you don't talk while you are chewing. thanks [alpine_007] hi there my friend, well me i dont eat while im eating because my mom will be angry to me because she told me if you will eat dont talk, like dont talk if your mouth is full and its not a good manners to talk while eating.
happy posting to all [shane1987] hi friend, it's really great that you don't talk while eating the food. enjoy, happy mylotting. [alpine_007] Nope, i seldom talk when i eat. Maybe just one or two words. I think it not very healthy and courtesy to eat and talk at the same time. I need to focus on food when i eat. haha...
... http://pay4effort.blogspot.com http://cool2share.blogspot.com [jianhong] http://getpaidfromsites.blogspot.com http://porschemotorsports.blogspot.com [alpine_007] I do talk over a meal, but never with my mouth full of food. I don't think it looks very pleasant and would be rude to my dinner companions. I don't like to see others talking with their mouths full of food so you can see what's in there either ;-) [derek_a] thanks, yes when we talk while eating other people who are also eating with us feel rude. enjoy, happy mylotting [alpine_007] Don't you think it's quite unusual when nobody is talking when sharing a lunch or dinner. My family likes to talk, discuss and share about everything from news. family events, church gatherings, birthdays etc. It's not proper to talk WHEN your MOUTH is FULL, that is the rules. But having conversation while eating is not bad behavior. I consider it valuable time to interact with my family and friends. Conversation is the point here, its not a military camp were nobody is talking while eating. [sutan74] i think and i have also heard that it is not good to talk while eating but still you can talk little bit while you stop chewing for a while. but it is your own life live it as you want to, enjoy. [alpine_007] Very Good point made! I prefer not to talk, while eating...but sometimes the matter becomes so urgnet....that I cannot resist myself from talking. Deepak I have accepted your request. [dpk262006] You are welcome! [dpk262006] It is always adviced not to talk while eating. But I do since at the dinner or lunch time there is a get together of all members and some one has to say something on the table and many a times it goes long and my mother scolds all of us and we finish the meals fast then. [ibsnet] thanks, well that is ok if you talk while you have stopped chewing the meals but if the food is in your mouth and you are trying to talk then it is really bad [alpine_007] no, I don't. It's my family's rule. Everyone always tells me that talking while eating is impolite. So I keep it as my habit since I was a child. Beside it, I think myself that when you talk white eating, people can see food in your mouth , and this's honestly not good [abiesm] i think that is a really good rule that you don't talk while eating, you are right that if we talk while eating then people can see the food in our mouth which is bad. [alpine_007] I often talk while eating food, because mostly i enjoy having breakfast, lunch and dinner with my family and friends and we discuss various issues over these meals! i of course dont talk with my mouth full. [destroyer] i think it is not a very good habit to talk while eating instead i would suggest you to talk when you have finished the meal, but it's your life live it as you want to. [alpine_007] If there is something to be talked about and people to talk with, why not?
I know traditionists say it is rude to speak while eating. But that's not really practical and "efficient" in today's age. :P [lordwarwizard] i think it's not good to talk while you are eating because sometimes the food in your mouth can be seen because or something in your mouth can slip out. but if u want to do it, then it's your life no one will stop you but it would be nice if you don't [alpine_007] only when its necessary then one speaks ---while eating---well i enjoy my meal without taking [charusabharwal] I do not like doing that because I would think that I am grossing someone out and I wouldn't want that to happen at all. [Lydia1901] I somtimes do talk while eating food. But at most times i like to eat my food in peace as it is important to chew the food properly so that it is properly digested by the body. And even when i talk i make sure that i don't have food in my mouth. [banta78] Hi Alpine:
If I did that my mother would come down from heaven and rap me on my knuckles.
People that do that spray the people they are talking with, with the things in their mouth. Yuk!
Thank you for asking me to be your friend and I hope you enjoy reading my discussions.
Ivor [TheSpy] I can not stand it when people talk to me with a mouth full of food, I think it is discusting to see in their mouth what they have chewed up!!! My mother does this all the time and I have to tell her not to as it really grosses me out! As you can tell from my reaction no I dont talk with my mouth full of food I always wait to empty my mouth before I speak
[Cassy1976] I speak a lot when I am eating:) I think it's the best time for us to have a chat with another when we are eating. [youless] I don't talk while eating the food. response to the discussion of alpine_007: do you talk while eating the food? why do you talk or don't talk while eating the food? share your opinions here: [prete2003] Hi alphine, Yeah, i talk alltimes when i eat..In our family we dont have time to mingle with each other..we share our day to day happenings in dining table..We used to commment about the foods we have..I feel bored and less interested if iam keeping mum while eating..Thanks [Coolgeth] No I dont talk while I have food in my mouth. I was taught from a very early age not to talk while eating.LOL So when I see someone doing that I get upset with them. And of course I must say to them its not polite to talk with food in your mouth. [TerryZ] i generally dont coz talking while eating is bad manners....but sometimes if something intresting striks my mind i cant control myself coz 4 me its tough 2 keep quite... [pav_28] I do talk while I am eating sometimes but I don't like to do it. because I find it is hard to enjoy my food while I am eating. [steve9737] It is difficult to talk with full mouth food.and i think it is not a good manner.always it will spit some to others or spit in the dishes. [mypigbox] i do not talk if i have food in my mouth. its just rude. my father was very strict about proper table manners. [4MYGIRLS] I do not usually talk while eating food, because i like to fully concentrate on the taste ofwhatever i'm having, but if it is a family dinner, or a dinner meeting , then ofcourse circumstance recquires that i talk and so i do it. But it isn't done willingly. [di1indilin] I talk while I am eating but don't talk with a full mouth of food . I can carry on a conversation while eating but find it rude when someone talks with their mouth full . It is easy enough to digest what you have before continuing the conversation as the person is going to wait for you weather you finish what you have in your mouth or not . [samtaylorskykierajen] Hi Alpine:
I never talk while I'm chewing my food. I think it is rude to do it.
Ivor [TheSpy] It depends on the food. Some food I can eat and talk without having problems, some not. I only talk when my mouth is half full and even that I usually cover it just in case. I do this mostly with my husband and friends, but not strangers since I won't know what they think of me if I do that. [LittleMel] it be really bad manners to talk while you are eating food.people no want to see chewed up food in some one mouth.that mak me sick and i chew an eat with my mouth closed.cant talk an eat at same time or i might spit food all over the table an that no be nice for other people eating at the same table as me. [TheLoneRangers] In my opinion, it'll be very impolite if I don't speak to the people who talk to me. So even if I am eating, I will still try to respond to others. Although it'll be embarrassing to speak when I'm eating the food. But I think it's still better to keep silent. [youless] We always try not to talk while eating the food. This is the table manner that we teach our child as well. Reason 1, it is very impolite to do so. Reason 2, it is very easy to choke from the health point of view. [Madona1] hi i do not think that anybody should talk while chewing their food. who wants to see a mouthfull of food that has been chewed up...i think that is gross. i have two children and i always make sure that they also act right when they are eating their food. my six year old still likes to use his fingers when eating alot of his food and it has been a chore working with him using his fork or spoon. lol. [RLFinNash] yes, but i'll make sure that i chew and swallow first my food before i talk :) [mhel_ahl19] I myself do not prefer to talk while eating.If I am with a person who is also the kind who doesn't talk while eating,I also don't talk. But most of the times,with Family Members,Relatives , or in Formal Lunches etc . , I need to talk while eating.Still I prefer to talk a little less as to when I am not eating. This is because I feel eating is a very important activity and should be done with minimum interruptions and disturbances.
[ptrikha1] I do not talked when my mouth is full coz the food certainly will go out and it is a bad habit. [cherylal]

Do You Do You Like Eating While Using Your Pc Or Watching Tv Is It Possible To Change Your Eating Habits Is It Bad Always Eating In Fast Food Restaurant Have Your Tried Eating Balut How Many Of You Think That Eating Meat Is Not Good Do You Think Eating Habit More Important Than Regular Exercise How Are You Spring Cleaning Your And Your Familys Eating Habits Do You Lick Your Fingers After Eating...... Sports Importance Of Games And Sports In Life Do U Play Sports As Passion Or Fun What Is Your Favorite Sports Team What Are Your Favourite Sports What Is Youre Fav Sports Do You Love Sports When Was The First Olympics What Sports Were Played Then What Kind Of Sports Do You Like Sports Or Arts Sports Teams Do You Find Basketball As A Good Sports Whats Ur Fav Sports What Sports Do You Like What Values Do We Learn From Sports I Like Sports Tell Me What Sports You Like And I Tell You Who You Are Do U Like Sports Or Music Mostwhich Sport Do U Like What Your Sports Which Sports Preferred:football,basket,hockey,baseball,soccer,motoring Ortennis Sports What Sports Did (do) You Play In School Sports Have You Driven A Sports Car Which Is Favorite Sports Your Favorite Sports Sports Cars Or Luxury Cars Sports Fans Kids And Sports Sports Injuries!
